TestCase.name: testAvgWithGroupBy
TestCase.Resource: SELECT AVG(a) FROM MyTable GROUP BY b

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[AVG($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0]) +- GlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, AVG((sum$0, count$1)) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- LocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, AVG(a) AS (sum$0, count$1)]) +- Calc(select=[b, a]) +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAvgWithoutGroupBy
TestCase.Resource: SELECT AVG(CAST(a AS DOUBLE)) FROM MyTable

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[AVG($0)]), rowType=[RecordType(DOUBLE EXPR$0)] +- LogicalProject($f0=[CAST($0):DOUBLE]), rowType=[RecordType(DOUBLE $f0)] +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, VARCHAR(2147483647) c)]

GlobalGroupAggregate(select=[AVG((sum$0, count$1)) AS EXPR$0]), rowType=[RecordType(DOUBLE EXPR$0)] +- Exchange(distribution=[single]), rowType=[RecordType(DOUBLE sum$0, BIGINT count$1)] +- LocalGroupAggregate(select=[AVG($f0) AS (sum$0, count$1)]), rowType=[RecordType(DOUBLE sum$0, BIGINT count$1)] +- Calc(select=[CAST(a) AS $f0]), rowType=[RecordType(DOUBLE $f0)] +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, VARCHAR(2147483647) c)] +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]), rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, VARCHAR(2147483647) c)]

TestCase.name: testCountWithGroupBy
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(a) FROM MyTable GROUP BY b

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0]) +- GlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, COUNT(count$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- LocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, COUNT(a) AS count$0]) +- Calc(select=[b, a]) +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithExpressionInSelect
TestCase.Resource: SELECT MIN(c), AVG(a) FROM (SELECT a, b + 3 AS d, c FROM MyTable) GROUP BY d

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[MIN($1)], EXPR$1=[AVG($2)]) +- LogicalProject(d=[+($1, 3)], c=[$2], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- GlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, MIN(min$0) AS EXPR$0, AVG((sum$1, count$2)) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- LocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, MIN(c) AS min$0, AVG(a) AS (sum$1, count$2)]) +- Calc(select=[+(b, 3) AS d, c, a]) +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCountWithoutGroupBy
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(a) FROM MyTable
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT($0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

GlobalGroupAggregate(select=[COUNT(count$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalGroupAggregate(select=[COUNT(a) AS count$0]) +- Calc(select=[a]) +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (SELECT b, SUM(a) FROM MyTable GROUP BY b) WHERE b = 2

LogicalProject(b=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 2)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[CAST(2:BIGINT) AS b, EXPR$1]) +- GlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- LocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[CAST(2:BIGINT) AS b, a], where=[=(b, 2:BIGINT)]) +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testGroupAggregateWithConstant
TestCase.Resource: SELECT four, SUM(a) FROM (SELECT b, 4 AS four, a FROM MyTable) GROUP BY b, four

LogicalProject(four=[$1], EXPR$1=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$1=[SUM($2)]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1], four=[4], a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[4 AS four, EXPR$1]) +- GlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- LocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[b, a]) +- MiniBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms], mode=[ProcTime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
